mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed_comment SET feed_id = #{feedId}, user_id = #{signedUserId}, comment = #{comment}
mapper.select: SELECT fc.id, fc.feed_id, fc.comment, fc.user_id, u.nm, u.pic FROM feed_comment fc JOIN user u ON fc.user_id = u.id WHERE fc.feed_id = #{feedId} ORDER BY fc.id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
